long_description: With a long run time, three bright white LEDs and glow-in-the-dark housing, the Ultimate Survival Technologies 30-Day lantern will keep camping festivities going long after the sun sets. Glow-in-the-dark housing makes the latern simple to find when the power goes out at home or you're returning to your camp in the dark of night. To activate the glow-in-the-dark feature, place the lantern in a well-lit area for 5 - 20 min.; the white, rubberized area will glow for 2 hrs. with a full 20 min. "charge". Three D batteries (sold separately) provide up to 720 hrs. (30 days) of use on low, 84 hrs. on medium, 32 hrs. on high and 360 hrs. on SOS strobe. Three 1.4W Nichia LEDs output up to 300 lumens on high, 150 lumens on medium and 29 lumens on low. Remove the globe for an even brighter light output. Built-in recessed hook in the base of the lantern lets you hang the lantern upside down to cast light down on a work area. Ultimate Survival Technologies 30-Day Glo lantern has ABS-plastic housing with rubberized zones to endure impacts.
short_description: With a long run time, three bright white LEDs and glow-in-the-dark housing, the Ultimate Survival Technologies 30-Day lantern will keep camping festivities going long after the sun sets.
